com.company.demo.user

Class UserManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.demo.user.UserManagement

  • public class UserManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for maintaining the user objects in the backend. This class supports all the user related operations for this application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserManagement() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean approveUser(java.lang.String email)
      This method is resposible for updating the user object's approval status to true if user exists.
      ZUser getUserFromZID(java.lang.String ZID)
      This method is used to search User object at Backend users HashMap It uses Backend zid_email HashMap to find emailId of the user from ZID.
      boolean isAuthorized(ZUser user)
      This method is used to check whether the user is authorized to do certain actions such as approveUser(String emailID), changeZCoinCommissionRate(double), changeConversionRate(double)
      boolean isUserExist(java.lang.String email, boolean flag)
      This method is used to check whether the user already exist or not exist.
      boolean login(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      This method is responsible for login a user by validating the email and password
      void register(ZUser user)
      This method is responsible for registering the user.
      ZUser searchAndGetZUser(java.lang.String email)
      This method is used to search and get the ZUser object from the Backend users HashMap This method returns null if no user is found for the given email ID

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String email,
                     java.lang.String password)
        This method is responsible for login a user by validating the email and password
        Parameters:
        email - should be a valid email ID
        password - should be a valid password A user must be registered and approved by admin before login. approveUser(String) to check the approve user implementation
        Returns:
        boolean value

      • register

        public void register(ZUser user)
        This method is responsible for registering the user. This methods creates object and store in in Backend users HashMap When the user is registered the ZID field is empty. ZID is created when the user was approved by the admin For more info check see also
        Parameters:
        user - should be a valid user object
        See Also:
        approveUser(String), Utility.ZIDgenerator()

      • approveUser

        public boolean approveUser(java.lang.String email)
        This method is resposible for updating the user object's approval status to true if user exists.
        Parameters:
        email - should be a valid emailID of an already registered user
        Returns:
        boolean value
        See Also:
        isUserExist(String, boolean)

      • isUserExist

        public boolean isUserExist(java.lang.String email,
                           boolean flag)
        This method is used to check whether the user already exist or not exist. If flag is true then this method displays that the user is already exist. If flag is false then this method displays that the user is not exist. For example:- login(String, String) the flag is set to false to check that the user is exist for the given Email ID. Otherwise it displays "No User found". For example:- register(ZUser) the flag is set to false to check that the user is not exist for the given Email ID. Otherwise it displays "User already exists".
        Parameters:
        email - should be an EmailID.
        flag - is used to control the behaviour of the method
        Returns:
        boolean value

      • searchAndGetZUser

        public ZUser searchAndGetZUser(java.lang.String email)
        This method is used to search and get the ZUser object from the Backend users HashMap This method returns null if no user is found for the given email ID
        Parameters:
        email - should be a valid emailID
        Returns:
        ZUser , null

      • getUserFromZID

        public ZUser getUserFromZID(java.lang.String ZID)
        This method is used to search User object at Backend users HashMap It uses Backend zid_email HashMap to find emailId of the user from ZID. Then it uses searchAndGetZUser(String) to get the User object
        Parameters:
        ZID - is an automatically generated valid ZID for searching the user
        Returns:
        ZUser, null

      • isAuthorized

        public boolean isAuthorized(ZUser user)
        This method is used to check whether the user is authorized to do certain actions such as approveUser(String emailID), changeZCoinCommissionRate(double), changeConversionRate(double)
        Parameters:
        user - should be an ZUser object
        Returns:
        boolean value
